#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>

using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef long long ll;

const int MAXINPUT = 1000;
int dp[MAXINPUT + 1][MAXINPUT + 1];
int main()
{
    for (int i=1; i<=MAXINPUT; ++i) {
        dp[0][i] = 1;
        dp[i][0] = 1;
    }

    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    for (int test=1; test<=T; ++test) {
        int m, n, K;
        scanf("%d%d%d", &m, &n, &K);
        
        for (int y=1; y<=n; ++y) {
            for (int x=1; x<=m; ++x) {
                dp[x][y] = (dp[x-1][y] + dp[x][y-1]) % K;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",dp[m][n]);
    }
        return 0;

}
